::Panzertron/Zardus::

Panzertron paces back and forth in the Iron Fist (now an island base, I 
think). This was taking too long. He opens a link to Zardus.

"Zardus, this is Panzertron, is that battle you were talking about over?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus walks through the Alliance base, stopping when he recieves 
Panzertron's message.

Before replying, he opens a comm to Reptilica. "Reptilica, how is the battle 
going?" he asks into his comm.

"Great. You can join in any time," Reptilica's voice replies.

Zardus switches frequencees again, to Panzertron's.

"Panzertron, the battle's still raging," he says, "You can join if you want, 
we can talk there."

Zardus turns to Desmodus. "Let's hurry, we need to be in time to at least 
kill a few bots."

With that, he turns around, exiting the base, and flying off toward the 
Predacon cave.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Panzertron sighs, walking off toward one of the shuttles. He needed to talk 
to Zardus, it didn't really matter where. The major boards the shuttle, 
launching off toward the Predacon cave.
